name: jaak-oto-sdk
summary: JAAK OTO SDK for KYC verification with liveness and OTO features
description:
JAAK OTO SDK is a powerful framework for implementing KYC (Know Your Customer) verification flows
with liveness detection and One-to-One (OTO) face verification. 

Features:
- License-based authentication with App Attestation
- Dynamic image compression (10MB limit) 
- Liveness detection using JAAKVisage
- OTO face verification
- Comprehensive telemetry and analytics
- Real-time status callbacks
- Easy integration
